Silence::

She heard the voice over Wolfblade's comlink.  Since they seemed
rather preoccupied, she leaned up towards Wolfblade's wrist so as not
to disturb them. "Uh, they are busy, ah, resolving, erhm, something
that needs to...uh, well, taken care of, I guess. But, I'm going
inside. So, if you want, I can meet you there. OK?" She left the two
outside and alone. 

She walked into the entrance and started looking about.  She was half
way down the main corridor when she noticed several autoguns pointed
at her. She stood there, not moving but looking at them with her large
owl eyes. "Oh my," she whispered under her breath.  "This isn't
exactly friendly is it?"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Rodimus:
> 
> Rodimus ried to get comlink with Wolfblade and Malice.
> 
> "Malice, Wolfblade... Respond... what's your report?"
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: robert riley 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Wednesday, March 16, 2005 12:05 AM
>   Subject: Re: Silence
> 
> 
>   Malice:
> 
>   He sighed a bit as the base came into view.  He wasn't ready to go
back just yet.  He wanted more time with Wolfblade, it was much
simpler out here, it was just him and her, with some minor annoyances.
 He pulled her close and put his arms around her.
> 
>   "We can get something later, let's stay out a bit more, I want to
be with you alone right now."
